alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Louisiana and Mississippi, including the following areas and parishes, in northeast Louisiana, Catahoula, Concordia, East Carroll, Franklin LA, Madison LA, Morehouse, Richland, Tensas and West Carroll. In Mississippi, Adams, Claiborne, Franklin MS, Issaquena, Jefferson and Warren. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms resulting in heavy rainfall through this evening with rainfall amounts of 2-4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
